What is (are) Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase (DPD) deficiency is a condition in which the body cannot break down the nucleotides thymine and uracil. DPD deficiency can have a wide range of severity; some individuals may have various neurolog
